title: 我有带着crash-reports来了
author: NO烈阳
txt_content:
本帖最后由 NO烈阳 于 2020-4-9 08:11 编辑 

下面为崩溃报告 我就换了java的版本    ---- Minecraft Crash Report ----  WARNING: coremods are present:   LesslagCorePlugin ([较少的滞后]lesslag-1.0-1.12.2.jar)   iceandfire (iceandfire-1.8.4.jar)   SSLoadingPlugin (SereneSeasons-1.12.2-1.2.18-universal.jar)   DLFMLCorePlugin ([动态光源]DynamicLights-1.12.2.jar)   ForgelinPlugin (Forgelin-1.8.4.jar)   Do not report to Forge!
